page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Altogether there are 27 buses which pass through Sidlesham each day.There is a bus about every half an hour.On Saturdays there are only 6 buses and they are once every two hours.It costs 65p for a single journey and Â£1.10 for a return journey from Sidlesham to Chichester. Sidlesham Good Companions Club has a minibus.It is used for outings and visits for disabled people in the area.It can carry 11 people and it is used to take them to Church,the shops, Handicapped Day Centres and the Health Centre. People donate money to run the minibus and the passengers sometimes give money as well.During the year they have fund raising events like concerts and suppers. Sidlesham Football Club also has a 13 seater minibus which is available for hire.
